system.description:
Ballistic polymer weave is an armor mod which improves the defensive abilities of some clothing items. A layer of this tough artificial fabric can be used as a lining in a variety of garments, giving them a limited ability to resist impacts, bullets, and energy blasts.

Knowledge of this recipe is possessed only by a few, and they share these secrets only occasionally. All ballistic weave mods are installed with the Repair skill.
